Sentencas: The application of positive temperature coefficient (PTC) thermistors to thermal management of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) is considered.
Titulo: Integrated thermal management strategy and materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A strategy is proposed for eliminating hotspots and reducing temperature gradients in SOFCs via inclusion of a material that exhibits a dramatic change in resistance near the desired maximum cell temperature.
Titulo: Integrated thermal management strategy and materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Three PTC thermistor materials with transition temperatures near the maximum desirable SOFC operating temperature are identified and screened for compatibility with common SOFC materials.
Titulo: Integrated thermal management strategy and materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: All are found to be unsuitable because of reaction with the SOFC materials or unacceptably small PTC effect.
Titulo: Integrated thermal management strategy and materials for solid oxide fuel cells
Integrated thermal management strategy and materials for solid oxide fuel cells
